meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Claudia Perry Mark Dawson Dave Abbott Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6789.

div.div: Battle of the Decades: The 1990s game 4.

td.p: Claudia Perry, a worker for an e-learning company from Evanston, Illinois
Mark Dawson, a writer and editor for the Honda Campus All-Star Challenge from Chamblee, Georgia
Dave Abbott, a musician and licensing executive from Fort Thomas, Kentucky

tr.td: NEBRASKA
WHOSE SONG?
INTERNAL FLUIDITY
ON THE BOOKSHELF
IT WAS THE '90s
ODDS & END"Z"
(Alex: Each correct response will end with a "Z".)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Home to a chuckwalla lizard breeding program, Henry Doorly Zoo is found in this city')

tr.td: Home to a chuckwalla lizard breeding program, Henry Doorly Zoo is found in this city

Mark
Claudia
WELCOME TO THE JUTE MILL
